name: Vercel Postgres
description: Connect external Postgres databases to your Vercel projects without managing database servers.

tiers.name: Marketplace Integrations
features: Connect to a range of Postgres providers

gotchas: Vercel Postgres is no longer available and has been moved to Neon. For new projects, users must install a Postgres integration from the Vercel Marketplace and connect to an external database provider.
Pricing for Vercel Postgres itself is no longer discoverable; pricing will depend on the chosen external Postgres provider via the Marketplace.
